Name: classid
Description: the oid of the system catalog the dependent object is in

Name: objid
Description: the oid of the specific dependent object

Name: objsubid
Description: for a table attribute, this is the attribute's column number (the objid and classid refer to the table itself). for all other object types, this field is presently zero.

Name: refclassid
Description: the oid of the system catalog the referenced object is in

Name: refobjid
Description: the oid of the specific referenced object

Name: refobjsubid
Description: for a table attribute, this is the attribute's column number (the refobjid and refclassid refer to the table itself). for all other object types, this field is presently zero.

Name: deptype
Description: a code defining the specific semantics of this dependency relationship.
